actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the property known as Mar-A-Lago from the United States to the Marjorie Merriweather Post Foundation of the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to transfer the property described in the order of designation of Mar-a-Lago National Historic Site in Florida to the Marjorie Merriweather Post Foundation of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the property known as Mar-A-Lago from the United States to the Marjorie Merriweather Post Foundation of the District of Columbia.
